)Plintissa isn't at the Maximal base, Zardus....she's at the Pred
base.......she walked there earlier....)

Plintissa was getting annoyed. "would you prefer me to join the Alliance
instead, Prowl?....well?...." she said.....
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 14, 2000 5:45 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Liono, DeathStorm and Grimlock wern't headed for the Ark. You need to read
> your posts.
>
> ::Zardus/DeathStorm/Prowl/Shredder/Mosquitor::
>
> Zardus lands outside the cave where energon readings were coming from.
>
> "Excelent. Reptilica, Bloodystrike, join us at my coordinates." He takes
one
> of the cutting lasers from Nemesis and goes to work on the energon, his
fuzor
> form protecting him from the harmfull efects.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DeathStorm arrives at the alliance base, panting and swearing at himself
for
> being outwitted by a maximal. He goes to the CR chambers for a fresh-up.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl looks from Iron Raptor to Plintissa. It was obvious that neither
wanted
> to fire at each other. He sighs. "Why the preds, though, Plintissa?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Shredder's already damaged form slams into a rock. Swearing, he pulls out
his
> gun and fires at Dark One.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Mosquitor's hand tightens its grip on his gun as he sees the battle in
front
> of him. He opens a channel to Hell Beast.
>
> "Leadership, the traitors are engaging with combat against each other.
Shall
> I destroy them?"
>
